did.abstract: Typed family history of Daisy Hitch Davies (1877-1938), a resident of Floral Park, N.Y., compiled circa 1927 by Davies.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Daisy Bell Hitch Davies (1877-1938) was born in New York, N.Y. and was the only daughter of William and Jane Hitch. She graduated from the State Normal School in New Paltz, N.Y., and then worked as a school teacher and clerk. She married Richard Price Davies in 1907. She later lived in Floral Park, N.Y.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Typed family history of Daisy Hitch Davies, a resident of Floral Park, N.Y., compiled circa 1927 by Davies. The typescript mostly covers the 17th through the 19th centuries and is organized by surname, with each section including ancestors' names, brief histories, significant dates, and some information on sources consulted. A family military history, arranged chronologically, is also included. Several of Davies's ancestors resided in New York City, as well as several parts of New York State.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Daisy Hitch Davies, date unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1973.
